Source Block:
input [AW-1:0]  bist_addr, // address
    input [DW-1:0]  bist_din  // data input
    );
   
   generate
      if(ASIC)
	begin
	   oh_memory_ram #(.DW(DW),
			   .DEPTH(DEPTH))	     
	   i_sram (//read port
		  .rd_dout	(rd_dout[DW-1:0]),
		  .rd_clk	(rd_clk),
		  .rd_en	(rd_en),
		  .rd_addr	(rd_addr[AW-1:0]),
		  //write port
		  .wr_en	(wr_en),
		  .wr_clk	(wr_clk),
		  .wr_addr	(wr_addr[AW-1:0]),
		  .wr_wem	(wr_wem[DW-1:0]),
		  .wr_din	(wr_din[DW-1:0]));
	end // if (ASIC)
      else
	begin
	   oh_memory_ram #(.DW(DW),
			   .DEPTH(DEPTH))	     
	   oh_memory_ram (//read port
			  .rd_dout	(rd_dout[DW-1:0]),
			  .rd_clk	(rd_clk),
			  .rd_en	(rd_en),
			  .rd_addr	(rd_addr[AW-1:0]),
			  //write port
			  .wr_en	(wr_en),
			  .wr_clk	(wr_clk),
			  .wr_addr	(wr_addr[AW-1:0]),
			  .wr_wem	(wr_wem[DW-1:0]),
			  .wr_din	(wr_din[DW-1:0]));
	end // else: !if(ASIC)
      endgenerate
   
   
      
endmodule // oh_memory_dp
